name: Orbital Wars (itch) (phuture2k)
description:
Intro

This is the prototype for my first indie game! Ever since I played Geometry Wars on Xbox that I wanted to create a space shooter that uses keyboard and mouse. So many years after that here it is 😊

I've released this to get your feedback about the game, first and foremost to know if you find it interesting and then how you think it should improve. More info on that in the Roadmap section.

Description

This is a skill intensive space shooter where you use your keyboard to move your ship and mouse to shoot at your enemies. Your enemies are generated in infinite waves and your goal is to kill as much ships as possible.  Pretty simple, huh? 

Just one important tip: KEEP MOVING!

Controls

WASD - Move ship 

Mouse - Target and shoot

ESC - Pause

Q - Quit (game must be paused)

Roadmap

The following items weren't included on the prototype and are on the roadmap. This list isn't ordered by priority. Would love to hear what you would like!

  • Improve sprites, background and animations
  • Improve music and sound
  • New enemies and weapons
  • New ships
  • Global leaderboard
  • New game modes
